name: Miles From Home
description:
Miles from Home is an intimate story about moving, travel, and transformation, that takes the shape of a lonely night trip through the freeways of Los Angeles.

The player takes the driver’s seat in an old 1970s Buick, taking the role of a man on his way to LAX Airport to leave the city of Los Angeles for good. The road to the airport will be paved with memories, second thoughts, and reflections, exploring the relationship between our lives and the places we inhabit, what does it mean to leave one's house and possessions, and the emotional toll that moving to a different city can take on someone.

--------------------------------------

Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1

Game Design: Daniel Chernov

Narrative: Luciano Salerno

Voice: Drew McGill

--------------------------------------
